name: Word 4 Words - very addictive word association game
name_original: Word 4 Words - very addictive word association game
description:
Improve your brain with this very fun word association game!

Try to guess the word based on up to 4 hint words that are associated with it.

++++++++ "VERY ADDICTIVE!!"
++++++++ "This is the best word game on the app store!"
++++++++ "Great time waster!"

FEATURES:

- Get help from Facebook friends if you ever get stuck
- Use bones to buy hints
- Win more bones with the slot machine mini-game
- Fun puppy animations and sounds
- Buy more bones is needed
